name: HF550X RFID
description: The existing HF550 adds barcode scanners and an interface for connecting to external devices and support user authentication for enhance security with fingerprinting capabilities

specifications.Data Capture:
1D/2D imager which can tag 300 tags per second
Reading range - Up to 50cm

name: S70
description: S70, the next generation Ultra-rugged for Enterprise Mobility based on 5G

specifications.Memory:
4GB RAM/ 64GB UFS Flash
8GB RAM/ 128GB UFS Flash (Optional)
specifications.Drop Spec:
Multiple 10 ft./3.05 m drops to concrete at room temperature per MIL-STD 810H
Multiple 8 ft./2.4 m drops to concrete over operating temp -20°C to 50°C per MIL-STD 810H
specifications.Tumble Spec: 2000 3.3 ft./1.0 m tumbles, meets or exceeds IEC tumble specification

name: EF551
description: EF551, the next generation full-rugged enterprise 5G mobile computer

specifications.Memory:
4GB RAM/ 64GB UFS Flash
8GB RAM/ 128GB UFS Flash (Optional)
specifications.Drop Spec:
Multiple 5 ft./1.5 m drop to concrete over -10° C to 50°C (14° F to 122° F) per MIL-STD 810H (Ultra Rugged SKU)
Multiple 8 ft./2.4 m drop to concrete at room temperature per MIL-STD 810H
Multiple 6 ft./1.8 m drop to concrete across full operating temperature range, EN 62262 (IKO6)
specifications.Tumble Spec:
1000 1.6 ft./0.5 m tumbles, meets or exceeds IEC tumble specification
2000 3.2 ft./1.0 m tumbles; (Rugged SKU), meets or exceeds IEC tumble specifications

Extended: 3.64V, 4,000 mAh

Read Range: 20+ ft. / 6+ m.
